description: From the Newbridge Holiday Table Linen Collection. This contemporary woven fabric tablecloth was designed to be a favorite for your busy home or restaurant. The Newbridge Red and Gold Fancy Metallic Snowflake Christmas No-Iron Soil Resistant Fabric Holiday Tablecloths feature an allover woven snowflake design with a subtle visual texture in gold metallic on a red background. Great for use with adults and children at home or in commercial settings. Perfect for decorating for Christmas, Chanukah, Winter and New Year’s dinner parties, weddings, banquets, holiday entertaining and everyday use. 100% polyester construction is easy care and soil resistant. Machine washable and tumble dry and requires little or no ironing. Finished with merrowed edges. Easy to fold and store when not in use. Hunter and Gold Fancy Metallic Snowflake Christmas No-Iron Soil Resistant Fabric Holiday Tablecloths are available in selection of 7 sizes and matching napkins. Colors: Gold/Ivory and Silver/White combinations. Sizes available are: 52” Square, 52 x 70 Oblong, 60 x 84 Oblong, 60 x 84 Oval, 60 x 102 Oblong, 60 x 120 Oblong, 60 x 144 Oblong and 70 Round. Matching Napkins are sold separately in sets of 4
